name: Rei Taro

Proficient in **AWS**, **GCP**, **Terraform**, **Ansible**, **Packer**, **Docker**, **Jenkins**, and **Kubernetes**, ensuring efficient deployment and management of scalable services. Demonstrated success at leading companies including VISA, Sii Poland, and Reply Polska, contributing to impactful and secure cloud initiatives.
